archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.3.12a: a) identifying when a data privacy breach occurs (typically by monitoring event logs or using intrusion detection, data leakage protection and network forensic tools)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
